name: Fly Divide
description:
Fly Divide is a fun-filled flying based game. Choose the member of the band you want to play as and fly your way to the top of the leaderboard.

Featuring music from “I Divide’s” brand new, critically acclaimed album “I’m Not Leaving” - OUT NOW!

DISCLAIMER: Please do not hold the band responsible for the insane amount of frustration you will experience playing the Fly Divide game.

Created by Meyume in collaboration with the hugely popular, up and coming British rock band "I Divide".

Find out more about "I Divide" : http://www.idivideband.com
Get more Meyume apps : http://meyume.com
